content.1: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.
content.2: And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.
content.3: And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, How long
content.4: Give out from among you three men for
content.5: And they shall divide it into seven parts: Judah shall abide in their coast on the south, and the house of Joseph shall abide in their coasts on the north.
content.6: Ye shall therefore describe the land
content.7: But the Levites have no part among you; for the priesthood of the
content.8: And the men arose, and went away: and Joshua charged them that went to describe the land, saying, Go and walk through the land, and describe it, and come again to me, that I may here cast lots for you before the
content.9: And the men went and passed through the land, and described it by cities into seven parts in a book, and came
content.10: And Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before the
content.11: And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families: and the coast of their lot came forth between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.
content.12: And their border on the north side was from Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the goings out thereof were at the wilderness of Beth-aven.
content.13: And the border went over from thence toward Luz, to the side of Luz, which
content.16: And the border came down to the end of the mountain that
content.17: And was drawn from the north, and went forth to En-shemesh, and went forth toward Geliloth, which
content.18: And passed along toward the side over against Arabah northward, and went down unto Arabah:
content.19: And the border passed along to the side of Beth-hoglah northward: and the outgoings of the border were at the north bay of the salt sea at the south end of Jordan: this
content.20: And Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This
content.21: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Beth-hoglah, and the valley of Keziz,
content.22: And Beth-arabah, and Zemaraim, and Beth-el,
content.23: And Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,
content.24: And Chephar-haammonai, and Ophni, and Gaba; twelve cities with their villages:
content.26: And Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,
content.27: And Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,
